title: Infinite Blade
original_name: インフィニティブレード
sinopse:
Lulu (Lucius Lucent) is a cold blooded female warrior that makes men in battlefields quiver in fear. Along with her magical armor, Gil, she destroys everything in her path with her overwhelming power… A dark fantasy with an epic setting and a speedy storyline!

(Source: Akibahara Channel)
